page.title: 15INDUSTRY
page.content: The New Town has developed a new area for employment in the west of the block at Winwick Quay.This area was probably chosen because of its close proximity to the motorway network, but the area has a wide range of available workers of all ages and abilities which suit the recruitment needs of many different firms.In the new development area,off Winwick Road, factory and warehouse space is provided,and the businesses range from printing to leisure(slot machines) and from wines to computers.Next to the new area in Winwick Road is the much older Fiat complex.Here there is storage space for thousands of cars, but these areas are no longer in use for storage as the base is now used as the main Fiat parts depot in the U.K.
